data.name: Witch girl got killed.
data.detailed_description:
Witch girl got killed. is a first-person fantasy horror action game.
You are a magical girl trainee in a town inspired by Japanese anime.
You must infiltrate the labyrinth that has appeared in the town and destroy the brains of the labyrinth.

Features:
・The town and the labyrinth are full of monsters. If they find you, they will kill you. Run away as fast as you can.
・Monsters are sensitive to light and magic. Be careful when you use them.
・You are an apprentice magical girl, so you cannot use strong magic. However, you can use simple magic. With magic, you can see things that normally cannot be seen and use warps. Use magic to escape from monsters and conquer the labyrinth.　
・Play time is about 40 to 60 minutes.
・Auto-save function is available.

data.short_description: Witch girl got killed. is a first-person fantasy horror action game. You are a magical girl trainee. Use magic and destroy the labyrinth while running away from monsters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790 CPU
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
